title: IEEE 802.15.4 - Wireless Sensor Network Standard
relevant_text: Defines the physical layer and media access control for low-rate wireless personal area networks, establishing the foundation for IoT sensor communication protocols including temperature sensor data transmission over wireless channels.

title: Wireless Sensor Networks: A Survey
relevant_text: Comprehensive survey of wireless sensor network architectures including temperature monitoring applications, energy-efficient protocols, and cloud-based data aggregation techniques for distributed sensing.

title: TinyOS: An Operating System for Sensor Networks
relevant_text: Describes TinyOS operating system for wireless sensor motes with built-in support for temperature sensing, mesh networking, and data collection from distributed sensor deployments.

title: Cloud Computing for IoT: Architecture and Implementation
relevant_text: Proposes architecture for connecting IoT sensors to cloud platforms for data storage and analytics, including temperature sensor data pipelines with real-time processing and machine learning analysis.

title: US5678901 - Digital Temperature Sensor with Serial Interface
relevant_text: Early digital temperature sensor patent describing a semiconductor temperature sensing element with digital serial output, forming the basis for modern IoT temperature sensors.

title: Zigbee Specification for Home Automation
relevant_text: Zigbee home automation profile including temperature sensor cluster definitions, wireless communication protocols, and mesh networking for smart home sensor networks.

title: MQTT Protocol Specification v3.1
relevant_text: Message Queuing Telemetry Transport protocol designed for IoT and sensor communications, providing lightweight publish-subscribe messaging for temperature sensor data transmission to cloud servers.

title: Machine Learning for Predictive Maintenance: A Review
relevant_text: Review of machine learning techniques applied to predictive maintenance using sensor data including temperature, vibration, and current measurements from industrial equipment.

title: Energy Harvesting for Wireless Sensor Networks
relevant_text: Survey of energy harvesting techniques for wireless sensor nodes including thermoelectric, solar, and kinetic energy sources enabling battery-free temperature sensor operation.

title: EP1234567 - Underwater Acoustic Sensor Communication System
relevant_text: Early patent describing acoustic modem communication for underwater sensors including temperature measurement, data logging, and wireless retrieval through acoustic signals.
